GStreamer Bad Plugins 0.10 Plugins Reference Manual
Top  |  Description  |  Object Hierarchy  |  Properties

stereo

stereo — Muck with the stereo signal to enhance its 'stereo-ness'

Synopsis

                    GstStereo;

Object Hierarchy

  GObject
   +----GstObject
         +----GstElement
               +----GstBaseTransform
                     +----GstAudioFilter
                           +----GstStereo

Properties

  "active"                   gboolean              : Read / Write
  "stereo"                   gfloat                : Read / Write

Description

Create a wide stereo effect.

Example pipelines

1
 
gst-launch -v filesrc location=sine.ogg ! oggdemux ! vorbisdec ! audioconvert ! stereo ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! alsasink
Play an Ogg/Vorbis file.

Details

GstStereo

typedef struct _GstStereo GstStereo;

Property Details

The "active" property

  "active"                   gboolean              : Read / Write

active.

Default value: TRUE

The "stereo" property

  "stereo"                   gfloat                : Read / Write

stereo.

Allowed values: [0,1]

Default value: 0.1
